title: Ending Soon: This Month’s GTA+ Benefits
headline: Ending Soon: This Month’s GTA+ Benefits
content:
Join GTA+ to get GTA$500,000 each month and access regular member-only events. There is only one week left to receive the following through May 1:

— An extra bonus of GTA$1,000,000 every month through August
— The Progen Itali GTB Super Car
— Exclusive clothing
— Biker discounts and bonuses
— Boosted business Production Speeds
— And more

Membership renews monthly, cancel any time. Visit rsg.ms/gtaplus for more info.
